casebody.data:
EAGLE SERVICES & TOWING, LLC, George K. Clardy, Jr., and Sylvia W. Clardy
v.
ACE MOTOR ACCEPTANCE CORP. No. 234P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Pamela S. Duffy, Attorney at Law, Burlington, R. Bryan Norris, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Ace Motor Acceptance Corp. Joseph L. Bell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Joseph G. McKellar, Attorney at Law, Rocky Mount, for Eagle Services & Towing, LLC, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of July 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
